K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-24: bid tstshe da ni bid tstshe da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-29: 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-30: gnod pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa ni rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-38: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-39: dmag gi nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-40: chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-42: stag gi nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-43: dom gyi nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-44: gzig gi nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-45: gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-46: sprul nag po'i nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:393b-47: lcags sgrog tu bcug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-3: sprul po che'i nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-4: glang po che'i nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-5: rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-6: dus kyi zhags pas zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-7: sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing gnod pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag la bsrung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-12: sarba bi dha na sa ya pra ty'artha ka ma moksha ni b'irya ni sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-13: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-14: sems can thams cad la byams par sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-15: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;bcings pa thams cad gcod par bya mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-16: 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-17: de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394a-19: nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-0: tadya @394b th'a; su ru su ru su ru /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-7: pukka si goo ri gandha ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-8: dombi ni ma tang gi pug ka se /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-9: dhu re dhu re dhu re dhu re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-12: sh'ante sh'anta ni m'a se mug te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-15: hi li hi li mi ha li mah'a li me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-17: su ba ne su ma ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-19: aa pri ta s'a dha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-20: na dhe na dhe mu khee /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-24: s'urya pra bhe s'urya rashm'i sa tri shi bram she brahma sv'a re aindri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-27: aa mri ta ma h'a pra bhe dundu bhi sv'a re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-31: s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-32: buddha ma nu sma r'a h'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-33: dharma ma nu sma r'a h'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-34: sangga ma nu sma r'a h'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-36: hri da ya ma nu sma ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-37: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-38: bo dhi satva me karma s'a dha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-40: k'a ru ni k'a ya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-41: karma me sa dh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-42: na mo a'ary'a wa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-43: siddhyan du mantra pa dee: sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-44: gang gi tshe 'di dag lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-45: padma'i sbyin sreg byas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-46: de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas brjod bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-47: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-48: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-49: bo dhi satv'a ya; mah'a satv'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:394b-56: a'ary'a ba lo ke te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-1: pa la'ang lan gsum bzlas brjod bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-2: aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar gtang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-3: 'di'i cho gar bya ba thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i nang du 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-4: rta gnas kyi rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor las bzlas brjod ji ltar bya ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga 'di'ang de bzhin du bzlas brjod bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-6: de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di'ang gser gyi padma'i cho ga mchod pa'i skabs su bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-7: de'i tshe mdo 'di'ang gser gyi rigs kyi yul du bskur bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-8: de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-9: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i phyag mtshan li'i yul 'khor der mi ji snyed skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-11: phyir mi ldog pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-13: byis pa rnams kyis bsod nams ji snyed byed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395a-14: de la li'i yul 'khor de ci'i phyir yang dang yang du gzhig par 'dod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-0: gzhig nus @395b par yang mi 'gyur zhes the tshom 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-1: des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar du rtag tu yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-2: sum brgya ni dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-3: dge slong ma'i tshul du gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-4: nyis brgya ni dge bsnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-10: byis pa'i tshul du gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag li yul 'khor der sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-12: bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir li yul du gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-13: gang gis bcom ldan 'das la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo zhu bar byed pa'i gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni dge slong brtson 'grus las byung ba de yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-14: de'i tshe ci'i phyir li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:395b-17: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ci nas der bdag cag sum pa rnams kyi mchod rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-0: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams 'jig @396a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-1: par mi 'gyur bar yul de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas ka pi la na'i mchod rten la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma med pa'i dpal tsandan gyi snying po dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do zhes de ltar mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-3: de'i tshe grong khyer der mir gyur pa dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-6: skye bo mang po 'byung ba de dag sum pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-7: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams gzhig tu 'ong ngo snyam ste shin tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-8: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ka pi la na'i mchod rten de'i srung ma'i mir 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs par bya'o snyam du sems kyi rtog pa skyes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-9: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe ka pi la na'i mchod rten du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung gnas rnams gshegs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396a-10: lha rnams kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dul bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-0: de'i tshe de'i nub mo dri ma med pa'i 'od las rab @396b nges zhes bya bar gyur pa lha rnams du ba'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-1: du ba'i sgra thos nas grong khyer 'dir sdig can gyi mi 'ong slar snyam nas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te gzungs sngags brjod do; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos bzhin du grong khyer du gshegs su gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du grong khyer gyi sgo nas gshegs su gsol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-4: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs par gyur pa de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis 'od zer btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-5: de dag las tshig de dag 'byung ba de dag gis rab nges de la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du grags pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par sgrogs pa phyag na rin chen mdzod bsnams zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-6: de'i tshe rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:396b-7: ka bi la na'i mchod rten gyi drung du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de dag gser gyi yul gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu 'ongs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-0: ci nas sum pa rnams kyi phran byed pa de las thar bar bya ba'i phyir de sngon gyi ma byin pa len pa @397a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-2: de nas gtam de grags par gyur nas sum pa rnams phyir ni ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-3: de nas de'i tshe der rab nges des phyis 'khor du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i sems can phal po che rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-4: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-6: ma 'ongs pa na ci'i phyir na bdag sum pas li'i yul du dri gtsang khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-7: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab rnams gshig par 'gyur snyam du the tshom za bar gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-8: yang na sum pa 'di dag la ci'i phyir bdag ces bya zhes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-9: 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-10: de'i yul du kun tu rgyu byang chub ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-11: rgyal po tshangs byin des yul nas bskrad nas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi yul du phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-12: bdag 'dir phan tshun du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-13: der lo ma'i spyil po zhig byas nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-14: de nas bud med gzhan zhig jo bo'i ba 'tsho zhing 'dug pa des kun tu rgyu de mthong nas sems dang ba thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-15: nyin gcig bzhin du bdag gi kha zas la longs spyod cig ces kha zas la mgron du gnyer to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397a-16: ba de dag bud med de nyid dbang ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-0: ngo bo'i yin pas na kun tu rgyu la kha zas byin pa gang yin @397b pa de ni der sbyar bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-1: bdag mi dbang ba'i 'o ma kun tu rgyu la byin pa gang yin pa de ni ma byin par blang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-2: de nas ba lang de dag gi bdag por gyur pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni sh'akya'i yul du skye ba blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi bstan pa bdag gis gshig par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-5: de'ang gzhan yin par mi lta yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-6: sum pa'i rgyal po gang li yul 'jig par byed pa de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-7: kun tu rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa nga yin no; ;bud med gang gis kun tu rgyu la 'o ma byin pa de ni rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gang gis sangs rgyas dka' ba spyod pa spyad nas bzhengs pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bul ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-8: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-9: nga'i yul der sum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-10: gdong dmar dag 'ong ba de'i rgyu ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-11: rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-12: de'i tshe rgyal po nga'i yul na bud med gzhan zhig la bu zhig yod pa de zhing rmo ba'i phyir phyi rol tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-13: der mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de'i 'dab tu zhing rmos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:397b-14: de nas bud med de'i bus mi de'i rkyal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-3: gdong dmar rnams li yul du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-4: bud med de'i bu gang gis phye dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-7: zong khyer ba de ni li'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-8: mi gang gis rkyal pa la sogs pa rdzas phrogs pa de ni de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-9: ba de dag ni de'i tshe dmag mir 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-10: mi de'i mar gyur pa'i bud med de ni de'i tshe li yul gyi rgyal po'i mar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-11: ma byin par len pa byed pa'i mi de'i mas ni phye de blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-12: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong grong khyer mdzes zhes bya ba la bsod snyoms su phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba des na'ang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-14: mi de ni ma la phye byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-15: mas kyang dge slong grong khyer mdzes la phul ba de de'i bsod nams bsags pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na li yul du dpa' sbyed ces bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-16: rgyu des na rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar yang gyur nas rgyal srid thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-18: phye sbyin par byed pa de ni rgyu des na mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-19: mi des lam gyi 'gram na 'bras rmos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398a-20: der mi gang dag gis 'bras chan chud gzan par byas pa de dag ni de'i tshe dge slong du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-0: des na de dag @398b gis dge 'dun gyi nor yul gyi glud du 'jal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-1: der bya sna tshogs kyis 'bras zos pa gang yin pa de dag ni de'i tshe li'i rgyal po'i bran du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-4: li yul du mi rgod mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-5: de dag gis ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu dge byed skyes pa de la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-6: gang gi tshe sdig byed skyes pa na de la gnod pa byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-7: de'i tshe mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag rgyal po yab kyi thad du gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-8: mi rgod de dag kyang li yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-10: mchod rten gyi nor chud gzon par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-11: mi rgod de dag kyang sngon ma byin par len pa byed byed pa'i phyir yan lag bcang nas bsad pa des na de dag gis kyang li'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i grags pa gsod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-12: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mi rgod de dag 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa'i dge slong zla ba dag pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:398b-13: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yab kyi bya ba byed byed pa 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal @399a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-1: pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku gdung yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-2: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bram ze dro na sa go tra zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa zhig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-3: gang gi tshe rgyal po rnams phan tshun du g-yul 'gyed par chas pa de'i tshe bram ze dro na sa go tras bum pa bzang po blangs nas sku gdung bged par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-4: gang gi tshe li yul du byang chub sems dpa' phal po che ma byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-5: mchod rten phal po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-7: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dag ma byung ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal grong khyer du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-8: rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-10: tham cad du 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du'ang snang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-12: rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du'ang snang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-13: rgyal mo ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-15: bram ze'i gzugs ji lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399a-16: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bar du thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-0: rol mo mkhan rol mo'i gnas la mkhas @399b pa gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad ston pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-1: chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi thad du'ang shin tu lhag par ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-2: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bud med kyi gzugs su ston ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-3: gang gi phyir bud med lhag par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni shin tu glen zhing shin tu ser sna che bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhag par bud med du ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-4: bud med byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa dag kyang yod pas na de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de lta bur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-5: bud med du skyes nas snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-6: bud med rnams kyang 'dzem par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-7: 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-8: skyes pa gzhan spong bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-9: gang gi tshe bdag sum pa der 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-10: mchod rten chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-11: dri gtsang khang mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:399b-12: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bzang po rnams bsreg par 'gyur bar lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-0: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa de ni nga @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-1: khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-2: der 'u bu cag gnyis kyis byang chub kyi phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-3: sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-5: ji ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa'i tshe; rdo rje sde dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mnos pa dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-7: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-8: 'od zer gang dag khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dir mthong ba de dag sangs rgyas par bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-9: khyod kyis gzung la bris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-10: de ming po'i thad du khyer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-11: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas de dag gis 'od zer btang ba'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-12: li yul 'di bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin la bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir der skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-13: chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phal po che de dag gi sku gdung mang po gnas pa de dag lha mo de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400a-14: mchod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la bged par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-0: yul der lha @400b mo de snying rje skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-1: ci nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-2: de nas grong khyer gyi nang du khang pa shin tu mdzes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-3: grong khyer de na mi ji snyed gnas pa de dag der ci nas bsod nams byed par 'gyur zhing 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-5: rtse bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-6: ci nas spyod pa de la 'jug par 'gyur bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-7: ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis li yul gyi phyir chos yang dag par bgro ba mdzad ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-8: li yul bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-9: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-11: go ma sa la gan dha'i mchod rten du bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-12: li yul byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-13: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-14: gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe nu bo khyod kyis bya ba'i dus la bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-15: rab nges kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir shes bzhin du'ang skye ba len par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:400b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'dir 'od zer btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-0: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la @401a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-2: skyes de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir khyer te 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-3: sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-5: 'od zer de dag kyang li yul gyi don du sangs rgyas kyis bzhes nas de dag gi grogs su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-6: byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang ci nas li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas shi 'phos nas der skye ba len par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-7: gang gi tshe li yul du gnod pa byung na de'i tshe sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-9: 'od zer gyi ming de dag bris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-10: grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su bzhag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-11: dmag gi nang du'ang bris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-13: yang na ming de dag 'dzin du gzhug cing bklag pa dang bcang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-14: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-15: mu ge rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-16: dge ba'i phyogs 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-17: sdig pa 'byang bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401a-18: nad las thar bar bya ba rnams la'ang phan par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-0: gang la sdig pa lci ba yod na des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro byas @401b te; sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-1: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sdang dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-2: 'od zer de dag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-3: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la'ang bzlas brjod bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-4: yang na nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bklag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-5: gang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-7: yang na ji lta bur 'dod kyang rung ste bzlas brjod bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-9: ci ste mi klog na'ang skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas nas btags na sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-10: grong khyer gang gi sgo la btags na grong khyer der dgra 'ong mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-12: gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-13: rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bskos pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur pa na phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi yul du khyer la phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-14: mi mang po'i mig sngar ni bstan par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-15: yul de'i glung kyang khyer la kha cig ni der bskur bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:401b-16: kha cig ni skar rdor gzhag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-1: tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-3: sngon byung ba ni 'di lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-4: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-6: zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-7: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-8: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-9: rnam pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-10: dga' ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-11: thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-12: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-13: 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-14: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-15: ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs nas smin mtshams kyi gseb nas snang ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-16: 'od zer de las kyang 'od zer bcu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-17: song nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'phros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa'i zhing de dag thams cad du ji ltar li yul du rdo rje gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-0: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi @402b phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de dag byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-1: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-2: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas dgongs pa mthun par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-5: sarba aa lang k'a ra ba ra ga ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-6: dha rma tsakra ba ra ga ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-7: ma ra see n+ya pa ra ga ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-8: aa b'i sha ya ba ra g'a t'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-10: sam ska ra pra ty'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-11: n'a ma ru pa pra ty'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-13: ni rud dha pra ty'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-19: r'a ksha sa sad tye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-20: aa su ra sad tye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-21: sarba ba ra sad tye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-22: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-23: gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thos pa de'i mod la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-24: gang gi tshe li yul gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos 'di gsungs pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-25: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-26: bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:402b-27: bdag sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das padma'i 'dab ma @403a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-1: dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-2: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma'i don bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-3: dam pa'i chos padma dkar po don du gnyer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i drung du smon lam gdab pa'i slad du mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-5: dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mjal ba slan chad lung bstan pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-6: de'i tshe der smon lam btab pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-7: gang du khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig ces bgyis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-9: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i thad du mchis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-11: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams ni chags shing zhen la sdang zhing nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403a-13: de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun las chen po nyams su len par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-0: de dag gi @403b sdig pa rnams tshe rabs kun tu sel bar byed do zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-1: de'i tshe bdag gis smon lam btab pa ji lta bu'i tshul dang thabs kyis der gzhan dag ma chi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-2: de'i tshe tshe rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-3: ci nas ngan song du ma mchi bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba blangs so; ;sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-4: gzhon nu nor bzang gis rnam par thar pa bdag la dris pa slan chad bdag gis mi'i nang du mi'i skye ba blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-5: bdag gis sems can dag dang 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis bdag la kho mo'ang glen mar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-6: sems can rnams yongs su grol ba'i slad du bud med kyi nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang po blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-12: bud med dbul mo dag tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-13: bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-14: bud med rnams yongs su grol bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:403b-15: rang gi las kyi dbang gris ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spyad kyang sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-0: tshe rabs du mar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gyi don gyi @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-1: slad du sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-2: bud med du skye bas shin tu skyo bar gyur na 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sug las chen por bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-3: tshe rabs grangs ma mchis par bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-5: sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa'i slad du bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-6: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i slad du tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bdag la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-7: yul de srungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de nad dung mi'ang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-8: yul yang ma byung mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-19: mi ma yin pa thams cad las dam pa blang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-20: ji srid du bdag tshe rabs de dag tu skye ba na bdag la 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404a-21: zhe sdang gi gzhir mthong na'ang bdag la sdig par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-0: ci rigs par skye ba'i dus 'tshal bar gyur la 'di lta bu yongs su @404b 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-1: gang gi tshe li yul thog mar byung ba'i dus la bab pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-2: de'i tshe yul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag thog mar rgyal por gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-3: li yul du nam rgyal po de dag gi ming chags shing rgyal rabs thog mar byung ba na tshe rabs bdun du rgyal po byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-4: grong khyer dngar ldan zhes bgyi ba'ang bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-5: bal po se'u tshal du ni sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-6: yul rta mjug tu ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i mchod rten bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-7: 'gum ti rar ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-8: rtsa rma pa nar yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-9: pa ya di kar ni dri gtsang khang chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-10: mchod rten chen po bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-11: ji srid du bdag rgyal srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-12: gang gi tshe rgyal po shi 'phos par gyur na'ang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs pa'i lha'i nang du skye bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-13: bdag de na mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dran par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-14: de nas slar yang li yul 'dir skye ba len cing ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugs su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-15: yang skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges zhes bya bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:404b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-0: @405a *// bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad de'i tshe bdag gis dran par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-1: mdo sde 'di'ang shin tu dran par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-2: ci nas thams cad rgyas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-3: gang gi tshe dmag sde gnyis 'thab par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-4: li yul gyi don gyi phyir las su bya ba yod par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-5: gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas li yul gyi phyir glud 'jal ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-6: 'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa'i lha de dag thams cad grogs su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-8: gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-9: ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshe rabs thams cad du dran par gyur cig ces byas so; ;gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-10: des ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405a-11: ci nas mdo 'di la sus kyang gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po'i mdo dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i klong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-0: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so zhes @405b bya ba byin te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-1: gang gi tshe khyod las rtsom pa de'i tshe 'od zer de dag steng du gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-2: de'i tshe gang gis mdo 'di dran par 'gyur zhing shin tu nyams su len par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de'i rang bzhin gang gis gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-5: sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-6: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od des kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-7: gzungs sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du rtogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-8: rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bas kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-9: gzhan gyis bar chad byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-10: de dag gi las ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la rta gnas kyi rig sngags gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ba'ang brjod par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:405b-11: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na lo bdun gyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzungs @406a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-1: sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-2: lha'i rol mo'i sgra sgrags nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-3: bdag cag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-4: na ma: sarba aa tyu da ga ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-5: badzra manda lo da ta ma sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-14: kurtsi ru pra ti pa da ri pa bha ba tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-15: ci tu ma tu ga la ra ya ka da ma ba tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-16: sa pa dza ma sa ra ta sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-17: gzungs sngags 'di ni lha rnams chad pas gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-18: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rtsva d'ur ba brgya rtsa brgyad spyin sreg byas na gang ci byed kyang rung ste lha rnams kyis gzhigs par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-20: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor nas gang du brjod pa der 'byung pos gnod pa byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-21: byad stems byed par yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-22: de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-27: skan dha na tsa pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-28: nad ta ma na pa na ga sa ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406a-29: da da tsa tsa pa pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-0: tsa da mi ma @406b bha sthi ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-1: dan ta ka ra na ha ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-4: sa da ba barsha ka ra na sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-5: 'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste; mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas skud pa de bsregs na khyim der byad stems kyis mi tshugs la 'byung po'i nad rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-8: de ba bar phu dzi dzi ri phu dzi da ti phu sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-9: gzungs sngags 'di lkog ma na ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas g-yag rnga la mdud pa bdun por te gdags par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-10: tadya th'a; sarba buddha da ma ba sha ka ra ba ba ra tsa tsa ra sa sa ra sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-11: gzungs sngags 'di lus la nad byung ba thams cad la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas skud pa la mdud pa bdun por te gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-12: de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-13: gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde yul skar rdo nas li yul du mchi ba de'i tshe gzungs sngags gang gis shul du dpa' bo'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis stsal par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-15: de bu bu de de bi bi sa sa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-16: bandha ba ba ra ti ka ra sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:406b-20: shad tra tra na dzi sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-0: gzungs sngags 'di 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun @407a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-1: bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas la lag par blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-3: bdag nyid kyis 'thungs na de la dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-4: dpa' bo'i las kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-6: de bzhin du rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-9: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-10: bdag cag gis kyang gzhon nu rdo rje sde de la ci nas dgra rnams kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-11: na mo badzra dhva dza sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-14: badzra bi bi bi bi ma ma sa ka su ma te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-18: na mo ma he shva ra sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-19: na mo bi shva ra ma na sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-20: na ma: san tsa ya sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-21: na mo ha ri ta yi ba su pu tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-26: pri ya pri ya pri ya pri ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-27: pud tra pud tra pud tra pud tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-28: ba ra dad ta ka ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-29: tstshandha mu le bid tve shan k'a r'a sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407a-33: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-0: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag @407b cag su ga las chen por bskos pa'i gzungs sngags gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de dag kyang bdag cag gis bshad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-1: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-2: gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go char 'gyur ba gang lags pa des chad pas bcad par bgyi ba de'ang bdag cag gis bshad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-4: su'ang rung ba dag sdig pa'i las rtsom pa na gzungs sngags bshad pa 'di gnyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-5: skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun por nas bsregs te sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bsreg la mi de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-6: bdag cag gis yid dam dang por bcas pa bzhin du ste gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-7: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-8: de nas 'khor der ji snyed 'dus pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:407b-17: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang y'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du bdag cag @408a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-1: thams cad kyis kyang dam bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-2: de ltar ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-3: bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha ci nas kyang li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur bar thams cad sems mthun pas lhan cig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-4: gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-6: ci nas li yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-7: gang gi tshe yul gzhan nas li yul du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs pa na der ci nas rim gro med par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-8: yul gzhan nas der sems can bros pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing gdong dmar gyis bsregs pa gang yin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-9: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dag 'chos ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi glus 'jal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-11: phan tshun du bag ma gtong ba dang len par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-12: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-13: gzhon nu rdo rje sde gnyis la li yul gtad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408a-14: de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-0: khyod @408b li yul gyi rgyal po byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-1: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis grogs byed par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-2: mdo 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams cad kyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-3: gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'i tshe rgya'i dmag li yul du 'ongs so zhis de skad thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-4: the tshom ma byed par li yul du song la der po nya btang na der 'ong bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-6: gu zan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-7: nga la phrin yig ni nga dang gnyen du byos la yul nga la byin cig ces springs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-8: de nas de'i tshe khyod ni li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-9: dbang po'i go cha ni skar rdo'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-10: de'ang khyod ci nas li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-11: skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe khyod kyis ji nas kyang gnod pa byed du ma bzhug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-12: dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar dum par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-13: las 'di dag byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-14: skar rdo ba ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-15: aa kun zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-16: de sngon ye shes grags zhes bya bar gyur pa na des dar ma ti ra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:408b-17: de nas khyod kyis aa ku na tshol zhig dang yul gzung ba'i phyir grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-1: dang khyod sngon smon lam lhan cig tu btab pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-2: aa kun zhes bya ba'i mi de ni sngon rgyal por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-3: mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-4: phyir ma rnyed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-5: khyod ni rgyal po'i blon po chen po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-6: dga' byed kyi phar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-7: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-9: khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal pa'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-10: lo sum cu'i bar du rgyal srid 'dzin par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-11: dge bsnyen du gyur nas li yul gyi phyir lus yongs su gtong ba'i 'bras bus thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-12: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-13: khyod li yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe mdo 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-16: skar rdo'i yul du'ang ming po la skur cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-17: khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409a-18: gang gi tshe khyod kyis gzungs sngags rnams rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyed la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid gsung bar 'gyur zhing lha rnams kyang ji nas khyod kyis las byed nus par 'gyur ba de lta bu rgyas par smra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-0: de nas de'i tshe @409b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-2: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'u du cag gnyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-3: der de skad du phyogs bcu na sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-4: de skad ces smon lam btang pa'i dus la de dran par gyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-6: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-7: gzhon nu rdo rje sde gtad pa 'di khyod kyis longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-16: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-19: rtag tu 'grogs 'grogs pa ni 'di dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:409b-22: ljon shing gi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-5: rigs kyi dbang phyug rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bos te bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-8: khyed nga'i theg pa chen po'i mdo 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-9: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-10: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od yongs su zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-11: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-12: khyod rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-14: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-15: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od khyod la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-16: gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-17: gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-18: lha'i bu blo gros bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-19: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-20: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-21: lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rgyal po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-24: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-26: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-27: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410a-28: yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-0: de nas @410b yang de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-1: ngas ji skad bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-2: khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs gyis la ngas dgongs pa kun thams cad nas thams cad du mthar phyin par gyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-3: ci nas yod par ma 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-4: ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na dka' las shin tu mang po dang ldan pa dag byas pa lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ma byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-5: nga'i li yul 'khor der sems can ngas yongs su smin par ma byas pa de gang yin pa de dag phyis li yul 'khor du gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-6: nga'i chos kyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-8: khyed thams cad la mdo 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-10: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-11: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-12: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-14: lha thams cad la mdo 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-16: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:410b-17: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i steng du lha'i me tog gi char phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-2: lha'i rgyan gyi char yang phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-3: de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zer shin tu mang po btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-5: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-6: de na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-7: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-10: mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-11: de nas de'i tshe dge slong kun dga' bo stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la mdo 'di klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-16: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-18: 'drir 'jug pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-0: sangs rgyas kyi @411b zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-3: klog pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-5: ji ltar 'bras bu gsum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes nga smra 'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-6: de nas lha dang klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-14: 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-15: bdag cag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa ji snyed mchis pa rnams gang du mdo 'di brjod pa der ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-16: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-17: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la gzungs sngags ma stsal tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-18: dam bcas pa 'di bskyud par gyur na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshigs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-19: mtshams ma mchis pa'i las bgyis pa'i sdig pa ji tsam mchis pa bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-20: de nas 'od zer de dag las tshig tu brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-21: gang na mdo 'di brjod pa der bdag cag 'ong ngo zhes sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:411b-22: de nas kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-0: 'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus @412a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-1: pa; bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-4: mdo 'di'i ming ni chos kyi spyi bo zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-6: dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-8: ngas chos gang bshad pa de dag thams cad ni mdo 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-15: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te; bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-011:412a-16: theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
